name: ObjectMethodsTest
description: Unit tests for methods in ObjectMethods class, focusing on retrieving and executing methods by name and return type.

nested_classes.name: Person
nested_classes.description: Internal class representing a person with age and name methods.

nested_classes.name: Age
nested_classes.description: Internal class representing age with a value method.

nested_classes.name: PersonName
nested_classes.description: Internal class representing a person's name with firstName and lastName methods.

test_cases.name: methodByName
test_cases.description: Tests the retrieval of methods by name from Person and PersonName classes.

test_cases.name: methodByReturnType
test_cases.description: Tests the execution of methods by return type from Person and PersonName classes.
